statements: SELECT * FROM customer_segmentation;
SELECT first_name, last_name, age FROM customer_segmentation WHERE city = 'New York';
SELECT first_name, email FROM customer_segmentation WHERE gender = 'FEMALE' ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_segmentation WHERE age < 30 AND city = 'Los Angeles';
SELECT first_name, last_name, city FROM customer_segmentation WHERE gender = 'MALE' ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM customer_segmentation WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY last_name ASC, first_name DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customer_segmentation WHERE gender = 'Female' AND city = 'New York';
SELECT customer_id, age FROM customer_segmentation WHERE gender = 'Male' ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT city FROM customer_segmentation WHERE age < 25;
SELECT * FROM customer_segmentation WHERE city = 'Los Angeles' AND gender = 'Male' ORDER BY age ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, age FROM customers WHERE age > 30;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE gender = 'Male' ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT customer_name, city FROM customers WHERE age BETWEEN 25 AND 50;
SELECT * FROM segments;
SELECT customer_name, age, city FROM customers WHERE gender = 'Male' ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT customer_name, city FROM customers WHERE age > 30 AND city = 'New York' ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers JOIN segments ON customers.customer_id = segments.segment_id;
SELECT segment_name, segment_description FROM segments WHERE segment_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY segment_name;
SELECT customer_name, city, age FROM customers WHERE city IN ('Chicago', 'Los Angeles') AND gender = 'Female' ORDER BY city, age DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE age > 30
SELECT customer_id, name, location FROM customers WHERE gender = 'Male'
SELECT segment_name, description FROM segments
SELECT * FROM customer_segments
SELECT name, age, location FROM customers WHERE age < 25
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE gender='Male';
SELECT name, age, location FROM customers WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT c.name, s.segment_name, s.description FROM customers c JOIN customer_segments cs ON c.customer_id = cs.customer_id JOIN segments s ON cs.segment_id = s.segment_id WHERE c.location='New York';
SELECT c.name, c.age, s.segment_name FROM customers c LEFT JOIN customer_segments cs ON c.customer_id = cs.customer_id LEFT JOIN segments s ON cs.segment_id = s.segment_id WHERE s.segment_name='VIP';
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE age BETWEEN 25 AND 40 AND gender='Female' ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT id, name, age FROM customers;
SELECT gender, location FROM customers WHERE age > 30;
SELECT * FROM demographics WHERE income > 50000;
SELECT segment_name, description FROM segments;
SELECT name, age, location FROM customers;
SELECT * FROM demographics WHERE income > 50000;
SELECT c.name, d.education, s.segment_name FROM customers c JOIN demographics d ON c.id = d.customer_id JOIN segments s ON d.id = s.segment_id;
SELECT c.name, d.income, dh.date FROM customers c JOIN demographics d ON c.id = d.customer_id JOIN campaign_history dh ON c.id = dh.customer_id;
SELECT c.name, s.segment_name, dh.result FROM customers c JOIN segments s ON c.id = s.segment_id JOIN campaign_history dh ON c.id = dh.customer_id WHERE dh.result = 'Success';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, age, gender FROM customers WHERE age > 30;
SELECT customer_name, email, location FROM customers ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT customer_id, product_name, purchase_amount FROM purchases WHERE purchase_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT c.customer_name, d.income, d.education_level FROM customers c JOIN demographics d ON c.customer_id = d.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT customer_name, purchase_amount FROM customers JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id WHERE purchase_amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_name, location, income FROM customers JOIN demographics ON customers.customer_id = demographics.customer_id WHERE income > 50000;

SELECT customer_name, education_level, segment_name FROM customers JOIN demographics ON customers.customer_id = demographics.customer_id JOIN customer_segments ON customers.customer_id = customer_segments.customer_id JOIN segments ON customer_segments.segment_id = segments.segment_id;
